tool.name: demo3D03
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D03 synthesizes one 3D image with nuclear, cell shape, and vesicular channels from all vesicular object models (nucleoli, lysosomes, endosomes, and mitochondria) with sampling method set to sample vesicular objects from Gaussians at density 75 without convolution. The model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset.
-----
**Inputs**
- Seed for Random Number Generator - Image Compression Algorithm
-----
**Output**
- One zip file containing six TIFF (.tif) files of the nuclear, cell shape, lysosomal, mitochondrial, nucleolar, and endosomal channels
-----
**Example**
demo3D03 generates the following images using the default parameters:
